projectGridLines.stationName: Secureworks India Private Limited (a Dell Technologies Company)
projectGridLines.title: Cloud API based security log ingestion and data normalization
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Project involves development, maintenance and test automation of Ingestor apps

that pull data from different Cloud APIs from Azure, Google, AWS and Rest APIs from several Security vendors and make the data normalized for for threat detection and alerting.

Skill sets: AWS, Kubernetes, GoLang, GraphQL, REST APIs, Python, PyTest, GITLab CI/CD, Playwright

Traits expectation: Problem Solving, High degree of perception, Equal importance to writing code for development and for test automation.

Expected learning: Agile based Software Development and Delivery, Working with APIs that handle large amounts of data, Working with Cloud Technologies, Understanding of Cyber Security, Threat detection and response.

projectGridLines.stationName: Secureworks India Private Limited (a Dell Technologies Company)
projectGridLines.title: Development of LogStash plugins for  security log ingestion and Automation of creation of schema documents for user defined custom parsers in Secureworks  XDR Portal
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Project involves development, maintenance and test automation of Ingestor apps

that push data from LogStash and make the data normalized for for threat detection and alerting. Also includes development of tools to generate up-to-date schema markup that help end users to define custom parsers for incoming logs.

Skill sets: AWS, Kubernetes, GoLang, GraphQL, REST APIs, Python, PyTest, GITLab CI/CD, Playwright

Traits expectation: Problem Solving, High degree of perception, Equal importance to writing code for development and for test automation.

Expected learning: Agile based Software Development and Delivery, Working with APIs that handle large amounts of data, Working with Cloud Technologies, Understanding of Cyber Security, Threat detection and response.

Specific courses required for project execution:  Programming in GoLang, Gitlab and Gitlab CI/CD, Writing DDL and DML SQL, Basic Familiarity with AWS Technologies (VPC, S3, RDS, Lambdas,EKS)

projectGridLines.stationName: Secureworks India Private Limited (a Dell Technologies Company)
projectGridLines.title: Port/Update a Python based application called ATF (Automated Test Framework)
projectGridLines.description:
Description: It is a crucial component used by both Security Researchers and Engineering teams for daily iPS/IDS ruleset testing.  It is a sort of stand alone application that runs on its own AWS EC2 instance and interacts with legacy services to push and test rulesets on IPS/IDS devices in the lab.  That application is currently stuck on python 2.7.  We need to update this to something like 3.12 - and we should do that while also building the application and deploying in the AWS/EKS  infrastructure we use.

Skill sets: Python, AWS, REST API, HTTP methods, TLS, GoLang, Gitlab, TCP/IP, networking and network security concepts

Traits expectation: Reverse engineering existing code base, problem solving, perseverance

Expected learning: Agile based Software Development and Delivery, Hands on IPS/IDS intrusion prevention/detection systems, Working with Cloud Technologies, Hands on CyberSecurity/Network Security software development, Threat detection and response.

projectGridLines.stationName: Secureworks India Private Limited (a Dell Technologies Company)
projectGridLines.title: Software upgrade of open sourced Dalton
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Our Threat Research team developed and open-sourced Dalton (years ago), a system to easily replay PCAPS against an IDS/IPS. This was used in the field and we have a large demand to upgrade its underlying technologies to the latest infra used at Secureworks.

Skill sets: Docker/Containerization, Networking and Network Security concepts, Python

Traits expectation: Ability to understand existing code, Quick learning of new technologies

Expected learning: Solid hands on exposure to programming Network security (aka Cyber Security) control devices and applications, Agile Based software development, GitLab CI/CD Deployment  and  AWS infrastructure as a service.

Specific courses required for project execution:  Python, Computer Networks, AWS and Kubernetes

projectGridLines.stationName: Secureworks India Private Limited (a Dell Technologies Company)
projectGridLines.title: Network Packet Broker on Azure
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Prototype / build-out network packet broker support on Azure (currently no SPAN/TAP support). This could mean integrating w/ a commercial offering or building out our own solution.

Skill sets: Python, Network programming, Azure, Application Integration 

Traits expectation: Interest in Cyber Security, Problem solving and Prototyping

Expected learning: Agile Development, Hands on Network Security service/application development, Working with Azure

Specific courses required for project execution:  Python, Network Programming, Azure
